Bash(git -C "h:\Github\PrincipiaMetaphysica" commit -m "Fix beginners-guide validation statistics: Make dynamic from PM constants

FIXED: Hardcoded validation stats now populate dynamically

Issue: Beginners guide had 6 hardcoded instances of ""10/14"" and ""10 of 14"" 
for validation statistics that didn''t match actual simulation outputs.

Solution: Added JavaScript to dynamically populate all validation stats from 
PM.pmns_matrix and PM.dark_energy sigma values.

Changes:
- Added 10 dynamic ID spans: bg-predictions-within-1sigma, bg-exact-matches, etc.
- Added DOMContentLoaded script to calculate stats from PM constants
- Stats calculated from 10 key predictions with experimental comparison:
  * n_gen (0.00Ïƒ - exact)
  * theta_23, theta_12, theta_13, delta_CP (PMNS angles)
  * w0, w_a (dark energy)
  * M_GUT, alpha_GUT_inv, tau_p (GUT scale)

Result:
- Stats will now update to 8/10 (80%) within 1Ïƒ, 1 exact match
- All references consistent throughout page
- Values trace to theory_output.json via PM constants

This makes beginners-guide.html consistent with index.html validation system.

Copyright (c) 2025-2026 Andrew Keith Watts. All rights reserved.")

Bash(git -C "h:/Github/PrincipiaMetaphysica" commit -m "Complete professional academic presentation: Remove marketing language, version refs, add spiritual acknowledgment

COMPREHENSIVE WEBSITE CLEANUP COMPLETE

This commit transforms the Principia Metaphysica website into a professional,
publication-ready academic framework through systematic removal of marketing
language, version references, and addition of spiritual acknowledgment.

MISSION OBJECTIVES (ALL COMPLETED):

1. Marketing/Hype Language Removal (~132 instances)
   - ""breakthrough"" to ""result""/""derivation"" (12 instances)
   - ""unprecedented"" to ""notable""/""significant"" (7 instances)
   - ""validates/confirms/proves"" to ""is consistent with"" (25+ instances)
   - ""EXACT/PERFECT"" to ""0.0Ïƒ deviation/agreement"" (12+ instances)
   - Exclamation marks to periods in scientific contexts (17 instances)

2. Version Reference Removal (~170 instances)
   - All v12.7, v12.5, v11.x references removed from user-facing content
   - 7 major update boxes deleted (~200 lines removed)
   - ""Previously X, now Y"" comparison language eliminated
   - Theory now presented as unified, timeless framework

3. Spiritual Acknowledgment Added
   - Added section to philosophical-implications.html (lines 2394-2412)
   - Acknowledges Jesus Christ as Logos and ruler of reality
   - Includes Gnostic cosmology (Monad, Yaldabaoth, Sophia, Sabaoth)
   - Hermetic principles integrated
   - Professional styling with golden-purple gradient

4. Broken Links Fixed (13 total)

BEGINNERS GUIDE CLEANUP

- ''9 of 10 Parameters Derived''
- ''1 Parameters 0.0Ïƒ Agreement''

RATIONALE:

what remains to be derived. Marketing language like ''100% parameter derivation''
undermines credibility when actual rigor is:
- Level A (Fundamental): 99% rigor âœ“
- Level B (Derived): 90% rigor âœ“
- Level C (Assumptions): 70% rigor âš ï¸
- Level D (Fitted): 40% rigor âŒ

presentation established across the rest of the website.
